attributes.title: NOOOO!!! :(
attributes.review: This app was absolutely terrible!!! I wish I was able to rate this lower than one star!! The main person that it was showing and talking about is a terrible influence!!!! What I mean is the man that is featured is a rapist, predator, homophobic and a racist!!!! Would not recommend!!!! If there was a different figure I think that the app would be much better try Lizzo!!!She is an amazing role model and influencer!! Also I think the app is too political! Feel free to try again!! :)

attributes.title: Possible Possession?
attributes.review: When i downloaded this app it played a siren that i could not turn off. Even when i powered off my phone it continued but even worst when anyone other than myself heard this siren that started screaming and shouting while running around until they passed out. This has led to my grandpa and grandma in the hospital and i had to get a new phone. Please if u are thinking about getting this app DO NOT!!!! This app is very dangerous.

attributes.title: AWFUL APP DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and immediately after it finished downloading many birds started following me on my daily walk. Their eyes followed my every move, blinking red every now an again, as if surveying my every move.  Also giant stick figures with speakers on their heads have been showing up, blasting ‘high hopes’ by panic at the disco (which they have no business using) while screeching about not being Joe Biden. Very distracting if I do say so myself.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: When I tell you that this app is a waist of time I really mean it. First of all the download speed is unbearable. It took me 3 weeks for this app to fully download. Second of all the GB usage. For some reason I had no more storage left after I downloaded. And I have a 500 GB plan. To be honest with you this app frustrates me so much to the point we’re i’m jus going to leave the review we’re it is. Hopefully you can leave a one star review to.

attributes.title: Groooossss☺️✨
attributes.review: This app is disgusting. As soon as I opened it I saw a giant picture of a soggy cheeto which made my depression come back. Not only did my mental health go down hill, I started profusely vomiting as well. Who thought this would be a good app???? I haven’t been able to eat for days and this app still haunts me! I think my dog got a peek of the app too cause he’s started having nightmares. This is hands down the worst thing I’ve ever laid eyes on. 0/10 don’t recommend.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review:
After seeing this app suggested to me by my (gross) grandma, I decided to download it. 

To everyone reading:

DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. Seriously. I cannot imagine a more poorly designed interface and it took FOREVER to load anything. By the first 30 seconds on this app I was PHYSICALLY nauseated and had to fight myself to try to stay on it. (It wasn’t worth it)... if I could give less stars I would. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME. Pathetic and sad attempt at creating a platform for your shameful campaign.

attributes.title: Saw a nude pic
attributes.review: I was just going to see when the new trump rally was but I came across a horrific picture of a fat orange guy with no clothes on. Mind you that it’s penis size was so small that it’s none existent. Anyway’s I was so disappointed that I completely turned off the phone and decided to go out for a jog. I had so much on mind that I decided that I cannot support this man that has such a Cheeto size  penis. I hope y’all have a good day and may god find you.😔

attributes.title: Bigly bad. Very stinky
attributes.review: I got this app to get a better perspective of the Republican Party platform. HOWEVER, immediately after opening it, my phone began to expel the worst stench I’ve ever smelled in my life, it smelled like McDonald’s cooking grease and moldy Diet Coke. I tried to wash my phone, but it wouldn’t stop. My nostrils and smell receptors are completely dead and have to be removed. I’m in the hospital right now awaiting a nose transplant that will cost me thousands bc Donald trump kicked me off Obamacare. Download at your own risk!!🤧🤧🚫🚫💯🤚🏼

attributes.title: don’t download
attributes.review: okay so i opened the app right? right. this old man who ig inspires to look like 16 year old girl with orange skin from spray tan and dyed blonde hair popped up. then my pet dragon saw it and he FREAKED out. like spitting fire freaked out. so, then, my dragon burnt my HOUSE DOWN!!! i almost died and my dragon flew away. i think he might be going to the whitehouse but idk. anyway i’m about to sue for damage to my house and my medical bills 😡. i’m very UNHAPPY. i don’t recommend this app UNLESS you want a death sentence. 😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡

i downloaded this app, but when it finished downloading it turned my whole screen orange !!!! all i saw was a full bright orange screen. also, trump EMERGED from my phone and burnt my house down :(. so now i am homeless AND i still had an orange phone !!! then, all of a sudden, 19 jets FLEW right over my head, which made trumps toupee fall off !!! he then scurried away. he wasn’t very fast though. i do NOT recommend getting this app !!!!!! it ruined my life ! 😾😾😾. such a bad app. 🥱
